decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of five years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990. | The proposed new windows shall be single glazed and in timber.  They shall match the original windows which they are replacing in all respects, including cross sections of frames, sills, mullions, transoms, glazing bars, configuration and ironmongery.  REASON:  To protect the appearance of the Brentham Garden Estate Conservation Area, in accordance with Unitary Development Plan (UDP) Adopted Policy B24, Replacement UDP Policy 4.8.
description: Replacement of existing timber frame windows with new frames of matching materials
